person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Full strength Vicenza , led by Uruguayan Marcelo Otero , may continue their surprise run at the top against an Inter side that has been less than impressive in three successive home draws .

Let's think step by step.

1. Full strength Vicenza
2. Uruguayan Marcelo Otero
3. Inter

These are the entities identified as "Person" in the given paragraph. "Full strength Vicenza" refers to the football team Vicenza in its entirety, with all its players in optimal form. "Uruguayan Marcelo Otero" refers to the specific person, Marcelo Otero, who is Uruguayan and is leading the team Vicenza. "Inter" also refers to a football team.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Marcelo Otero

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "Full strength Vicenza" and "Inter", are not irrelevant but they are not clearly referring to a specific person. "Full strength Vicenza" refers to the team as a whole and "Inter" refers to another football team.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Marcelo Otero |

This table lists the person entity mentioned in the paragraph, "Marcelo Otero", in a single column.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Full strength Vicenza , led by Uruguayan Marcelo Otero , may continue their surprise run at the top against an Inter side that has been less than impressive in three successive home draws .

Let's think step by step.

1. Full strength Vicenza: Vicenza (city or team location)
2. led by: Not a location entity
3. Uruguayan Marcelo Otero: Uruguay (country) - Marcelo Otero (person)
4. Inter side: Inter (team)
5. that has been less than impressive in three successive home draws: Inter (team) - home (location) - draws (event or action)

So, the location entities in the paragraph are "Vicenza" and "home".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

Paragraph: Full strength Vicenza (city or team location) may continue their surprise run at the top against Inter (team) in home (location) draws.

So, the location entities in the paragraph are "Vicenza" and "home".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| Vicenza (city or team location) |
| home (location) |

So, the location entities in the paragraph are "Vicenza" and "home".
